questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of blanching vegetables?
options: To make them easier to peel

questions.questionText: Explain the difference between baking and roasting.
questions.correctAnswer: Baking is typically done at lower temperatures and is used for breads and pastries, while roasting is done at higher temperatures and is often used for meats and vegetables.
questions.answerShow: Baking is for breads; roasting is for meats.
